example.text: [[user]] are ready to deliver real immigration reform and invest in a secure border. House Republicans are once again recycling failed extreme policies that do not work. Team Normal vs. Team Extreme. [[url]]

Veterans in the Inland Empire and across this country need an easy way to access this information without jumping through bureaucratic hoops. This bipartisan bill is a commonsense solution that cuts this red tape and will help American veterans.

I also presented the Young Visionaries Youth Leadership Academy with $733,533 in federal funding I secured for their Empowering Youth Resilience and Promoting Social Emotional Healing program. This funding will help youth in the Inland Empire get access to mentorship programs, scholarships and tools they need to have brighter futures.

Mr. Speaker, I rise today in strong opposition to the resolution. It is shameful that the temporary Republican majority continue to waste the American people's time with baseless accusations and rightwing conspiracy theories.

[[user]] are ready to deliver real immigration reform and invest in a secure border. House Republicans are once again recycling failed extreme policies that do not work. Team Normal vs. Team Extreme. [[url]]

That's why I am fighting for legislation that once again makes Roe v. Wade the law of the land. Thanks, Pete Aguilar Member of Congress Washington, DC Office 108 Cannon HOB Washington, DC 20515 Phone: (202) 225-3201 Fax: (202) 226-6962 San Bernardino Office 685 E Carnegie Drive, Suite 100 San Bernardino, CA 92408 Phone: (909) 890-4445 Fax: (909) 890-9643 | Privacy Policy
